attributes.action: Extend learner drivers theory pass certificates.
attributes.additional_details:
Learner drivers as suffering with anxiety due to lockdowns, why should the suffer.
Less drivers on the road means less road tax for the government.
I think an extension would benefit all parties.
attributes.background: Passed theory tests should be extended for around a year.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend theory test certificates or offer free retake: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596206

Extend the DVSA Theory Test expiration by 3 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592839

Extended Theory Test expiry dates by 6 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602298
